column1: 136 ^ Hìmnum cantáte nobîs de cánticîs Siónis ^ Sing for us one of the songs of Sion

column2: Deus meus ^ In the sight of the angels I praise thee

column4: thou searches me throughout and knowest me

column2: Dòmine ^ From the unjust man deliver me

column3: sit in terra vivèntium ^ Let my portion
column5: be in the land of the living

column2: Deus meus ^ Blessed be the Lord
Dòmine ^ Every day I will praise thee

column1: 145 ^ Laŭdábo Deum in vita mea ^ I will praise God in my life
146 ^ Deo nostro jucùnda sit laŭdátio ^ Let praise be pleasing unto our God
